thread.title: The 100 Best Amazon Deals Happening This November — Starting at $5 - Dutch News Today
thread.title_full: The 100 Best Amazon Deals Happening This November — Starting at $5 - Dutch News Today

author: Admin
title: The 100 Best Amazon Deals Happening This November — Starting at $5 - Dutch News Today
text: November is in full swing, which means the [holiday season is right around the corner](https://people.com/target-black-friday-deals-2023-announcement-8385317). Luckily, Amazon is chock-full of everything you need for gifting, cooking, and hosting ahead of Black Friday. If you’re looking to get a jump on holiday prep, don’t miss the impressive markdowns hiding in [Amazon’s sale section](https://www.amazon.com/deals?tag=people-onsite-backup-20). Right now, shoppers can save up to 86 percent on top-rated finds from Apple, Dyson, Le Creuset, and New Balance. There are discounts on robot vacuum cleaners, plush bedding, handy kitchen appliances, and so much more — with stackable coupons and Prime-exclusive savings to boot. Now for the best part: Prices start at just $5. Best Deals Overall - 86% Off: [Tvwio Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CGL8NBM8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $114.99 with coupon (orig. $699.99) - Top-Rated: [Apple Watch SE (2nd Generation)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CHX8RVB8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $219 (orig. $249) - Rare Deal: [Foreo Luna 3 Sonic Cleansing Brush](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QC61CZ5?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $146.73 (orig. $219) [Apple AirPods (2nd Generation)](https://www.amazon.com/Apple-AirPods-Charging-Latest-Model/dp/B07PXGQC1Q?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $99 (orig. $129) [Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09HN81KVR?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $20.64 (orig. $24) [Lodge Pre-Seasoned Cast Iron Skillet](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00006JSUA?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $19.90 (orig. $34.25) [iRobot Roomba 694 Robot Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08SP5GYJP?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $159 (orig. $274.99) [Martha Stewart Cotton Down Comforter](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BPK29LLJ?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $59.99 (orig. $122.99) [Le Creuset Enameled Cast Iron Saucepan](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0BXM15PVT/ref=ox_sc_act_title_1?smid=ATVPDKIKX0DER&th=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $179.95 (orig. $267.95) [Levoit HEPA Air Purifier](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08R794ZMX?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $189.99 with coupon (orig. $219.99) Tvwio Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, $115 with Coupon The best deals we found include an [Apple Watch SE](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CHX8RVB8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), a [Lodge cast iron skillet](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00006JSUA?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), and a [Foreo facial cleansing brush](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QC61CZ5?tag=people-onsite-backup-20). There are markdowns galore on reviewer-loved products like the [Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09HN81KVR?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), which is down to $20, and a [Levoit air purifier](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08R794ZMX?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that’s under $200. Plus, you can save big on new vacuum cleaners, like this best-selling [Roomba iRobot model](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08SP5GYJP?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), along with this [cordless vacuum](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CGL8NBM8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that’s a full 86 percent off thanks to double discounts. There are tons of other markdowns to explore at Amazon right now. You’ll find wow-worthy deals in every department, including home, fashion, and tech. Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation), $190 (Save 24%) Best Tech and Electronics Deals Devices from Apple, Beats, Anker, and Amazon are all on sale. Upgrade your headphones or give the gift of high-quality listening this month with any of the many deals on popular earbuds. The [second-generation Apple AirPods Pro](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CHWRXH8B?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) are under $200, the [Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07YVYZ8T5?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) are under $100, and the highly coveted [Apple AirPods Max](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08PZD76NP?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) are $69 less. You can even save on a top-rated [JBL Flip 5 Bluetooth Speaker](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QK2SPP7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) for non-headphone listening. [Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CHWRXH8B?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $189.99 (orig. $249) [Amazon Fire Stick (3rd Generation)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08C1W5N87?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $19.99 (orig. $39.99) [Kasa Smart Plug 4-Pack](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07RCNB2L3?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $24.49 (orig. $29.99) [HP DeskJet Wireless Color Printer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08XYRDSL7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $69.99 (orig. $99.99) [Apple AirPods Max](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08PZD76NP?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $479.99 (orig. $549) [Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07YVYZ8T5?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $99.95 (orig. $199.95) [Apple iPad Air](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09V3JJT5D?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $499.99 (orig. $599) [JBL Flip 5 Bluetooth Speaker](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QK2SPP7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $89.95 (orig. $129.95) [Anker Portable Charger Power Bank](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QXV6N1B?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $12.59 (orig. $17.99) [Apple MackBook Air Laptop (2023)](https://www.amazon.com/Apple-2023-MacBook-Laptop-chip/dp/B0C7686169?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $1,049.99 (orig. $1,299) Bedsure Queen Bed Pillows 2-Pack, $25 with Coupon Best Home Deals Amazon’s home department is bursting with discounts on bedding, cleaning gadgets, and seasonal gems. Refresh your sleep sanctuary with this [pair of bed pillows](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08HVJQ2YP?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that are “soft yet supportive,” [according to one reviewer](https://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-reviews/R1XA40UPRM76MA?tag=people-onsite-backup-20). Or grab this set of [cooling bed sheets](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00NLLUMOE?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that have more than 250,000 perfect ratings (yes, you read that right). And if you’re hosting any Thanksgiving or football sunday celebrations this month, snap up this now-$20 [artificial autumn wreath](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B096SGS6WZ?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) to welcome guests at your front door. You can also score savings on a [Lasko space heater](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000TTSXNI?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) to help brave the elements and a [Pure Enrichment humidifier ](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B013IJPTFK?tag=people-onsite-backup-20)to combat dry, cold air. [Bedsure Queen Bed Pillows 2-Pack](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08HVJQ2YP?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $24.64 with coupon (orig. $32.99) [Bissell SpotClean Pet Pro Carpet Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07D46SQ63?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $129 (orig. $175.09) [Pure Enrichment MistAire Ultrasonic Humidifier](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B013IJPTFK?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $39.99 (orig. $49.99) [Mellanni Iconic Collection Bed Sheets Set](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00NLLUMOE?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $33.22 with coupon (orig. $50.97) [Lasko Oscillating Space Heater](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000TTSXNI?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $59.99 (orig. $69.99) [Shark Steam Pocket Mop](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0028MB3HM?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $65.90 (orig. $89.99) [Labigo Electric Spin Scrubber](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09GBBRJN8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $60.99 with coupon (orig. $74.99) [Aroeve Air Purifier](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09FJSJQ95?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $39.99 with coupon (orig. $69.99) [Green Orange Fleece Throw Blanket](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07R85559M?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $16.99 with coupon (orig. $23.99) [VioletEverGarden Artificial Autumn Wreath](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B096SGS6WZ?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $19.99 (orig. $29.99) Shark Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe Upright Vacuum Cleaner, $100 (Save 55%) Best Vacuum Deals Prices are slashed on all sorts of vacuum models from top brands like Shark, Bissell, Black+Decker, and even Dyson. You can save on [car vacuum cleaners](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07LH5VSX4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), self-emptying [robot vacuums](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09H8CWFNK?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), and even [wet and dry vacuums](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01DTYAZO4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that can tackle a variety of messes on a variety of surfaces. On the hunt for a tried-and-true model? Snap up [PEOPLE’s top pick](https://people.com/home/best-vacuum-cleaners/) for the best upright vacuum cleaner: the [Shark Navigator Lift-Away Deluxe](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00JH98GR4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20). It functions as a standard vacuum for hard floors and carpet, but also “lifts away” into two pieces and works as a handheld device with an extended wand for hard-to-reach messes. For something sleeker, opt for this popular [Eureka stick vacuum](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07SMJJTL7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that’s slim, lightweight, and wire-free. [Shark Navigator Lift Away Deluxe Upright Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00JH98GR4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $99.95 (orig. $219.99) [iRobot Roomba S9+ Robot Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07QXM2V6X?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $599 (orig. $999.99) [Eureka RapidClean Pro Cordless Stick Vacuum](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07SMJJTL7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $114.99 with coupon (orig. $154.99) [ThisWorx Car Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07LH5VSX4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $34.99 (orig. $45.99) [Dyson V11 Plus Cordless Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0CB9WT35H?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $549.99 (orig. $719.99) [Bissell SurfaceSense Allergen Lift-Off Upright Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BPJX6Z19?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $209.99 (orig. $299.99) [Black+Decker Dustbuster Cordless Handheld Vacuum](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B006LXOJC0?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $49.99 (orig. $59.99) [Tineco Pure One S11 Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08CDQ52TB?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $249.99 with coupon (orig. $399.99) [Shark AI Ultra Robot Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09H8CWFNK?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $299.99 (orig. $549.99) [Bissell CrossWave Wet and Dry Vacuum Cleaner](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01DTYAZO4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $219.49 (orig. $257.49) Keurig K-Elite Single Serve Coffee Maker, $119 (Save 37%) Best Kitchen Deals Whether you’re an at-home chef or you’re looking for a gift to give to friends and family, Amazon’s kitchen department is chock-full of impressive deals. You can bake pumpkin, apple, or pecan pie in this [Le Creuset baking dish](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BH9DGPR3?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that’s under $50, and whip up yummy sides in this [Martha Stewart Dutch oven](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BNJX2PLB?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that’s 31 percent off. Appliances from Cuisinart, KitchenAid, and Ninja are also on sale. Cut meal prep time in half with this [8-cup food processor](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00MVWGFP4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that can chop, cut, and mix food in a flash, and this [five-speed hand mixer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00QUGZHSI?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) for baking endeavors. And snag this [Keurig coffee maker](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07N3GRVGS?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that can brew hot and iced drinks in a flash for $70 less. [Keurig K-Elite Single Serve Coffee Maker](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07N3GRVGS?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $119 (orig. $189.99) [Martha Stewart 7-Quart Cast Iron Enamel Dutch Oven](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BNJX2PLB?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $54.99 (orig. $79.99) [Le Creuset Stoneware Heritage Pie Dish](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BH9DGPR3?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $45 (orig. $55.95) [Henckels 15-Piece Knife Set with Block](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00GHX5HGG?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $150 (orig. $345) [Cuisinart 8-Cup Food Processor](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00MVWGFP4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $69.99 (orig. $99.95) [Goodcook Baking Sheet](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0026RHI0U?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $8.99 (orig. $13.80) [Ninja Professional Plus Blender](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0855B5Z6F?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $89.95 (orig. $119.99) [KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00QUGZHSI?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $44.99 (orig. $59.99) [Sensarte Nonstick Frying Pan](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B086PHS2V8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $17.99 with Prime (orig. $29.99) [JoyJolt 4-Pack Layla Wine Glasses](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B078JZ3V1V?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $29.95 (orig. $49.95) New Balance 515 V3 Sneaker, $60 (Save 20%) Best Fashion Deals Closet staples and seasonal must-haves are majorly marked down. To brave the cold weather ahead, stock up on reviewer-revered [knit cardigans](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C6Y443KT?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), [puffer jackets](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08L7GSL12?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), and [toasty socks](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09D8QRT67?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20) from one of [Oprah’s favorite brands](https://people.com/oprah-winfrey-cozy-earth-bamboo-pajamas-review-7964223). You can even score a [Hanes fleece sweatshirt](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01L8JJ57U?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20) for just $9, which is great for lounging, working out, or layering on extra chilly days. And for year-round favorites, grab a pair of [New Balance V3 sneakers](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09YBLCL41?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20) and [Gloria Vanderilt jeans](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000NZTPN0?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) for up to 70 percent off. [New Balance 515 V3 Sneaker](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09YBLCL41?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $59.99 (orig. $74.99) [Hanes EcoSmart Fleece Sweatshirt](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01L8JJ57U?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $8.91 (orig. $18) [Satina High-Waisted Pocket Leggings](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B083C58G34?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $18.99 (orig. $26.99) [Cozy Earth Lounge Socks 3-Pack](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B09D8QRT67?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $44 (orig. $55) [Lillusory Button-Up Cardigan](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C6Y443KT?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $28.79 (orig. $39.99) [Merokeety Puffer Coat](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08L7GSL12?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $64.99 with coupon (orig. $79.99) [Gloria Vanderbilt Classic Amanda High-Rise Jeans](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000NZTPN0?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $10–$40.90 (orig. $48) [Calvin Klein Modern Cotton Unlined Wireless Bralette](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00GBCTM2S?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $21.31 (orig. $30) [Anrabess Swing Sweater Dress](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B6H5NZ77?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $45.99 (orig. $59.99) [Dearfoams Fireside Sydney Shearling Slippers](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07TY29FG4?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $49.95 (orig. $89) Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Concealer, $9 (Save 20%) Best Beauty Deals Beauty lovers can save on everything from drugstore darlings, like the [Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Concealer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B004Y9GY44?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), to high-end gadgets, like the [Shark HyperAir Hair Dryer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09CLN86XB?tag=people-onsite-backup-20). Top-selling skincare, including this [CeraVe body lotion](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000YJ2SLG?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) and the [Cosrx Snail Mucin Essence](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00PBX3L7K?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), are now under $15, and popular makeup like the [Maybelline New York Sky High Mascara](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08H4FSGDW?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) and [L’Oréal Paris Color Riche Lipsticks](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B004BJ6VNG?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) are less than $10. To top it off (literally), there are steep discounts on nourishing [hair masks](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NT4GWR7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) and [oil treatments](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0048EZNR4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), too. [Maybelline New York Instant Age Rewind Concealer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B004Y9GY44?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $8.99 (orig. $10.99) [Revlon One Step Volumizer Plus 2.0 Blow Dry Brush](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B096SVJZSW?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $33.19 (orig. $69.99) [Garnier SkinActive Micellar Water](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B017PCGABI?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $8.65 (orig. $11.99) [L’Oréal Paris Color Riche Lipstick](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B004BJ6VNG?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $4.99 (orig. $9.99) [SheaMoisture Raw Shea Deep Moisturizing Hair Masque](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07NT4GWR7?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $10.54 (orig. $21.96) [CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B000YJ2SLG?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $11.34 (orig. $14.99) [Cosrx Snail Mucin Essence](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00PBX3L7K?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $14.59 (orig. $25) [Maybelline New York Sky High Mascara](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B08H4FSGDW?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $9.98 (orig. $12.99) [Ogx Renewing Argan Oil of Morocco Hair Treatment](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0048EZNR4?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $5.89 (orig. $10.69) [Shark HyperAir Hair Dryer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09CLN86XB?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $159.99 (orig. $229.99) Lenox 4-Piece Holiday Mug Set, $37 (Save 25%) Best Outlet Deals Savvy shoppers, listen up: [Amazon’s hidden Overstock Outlet](https://www.amazon.com/outlet?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) is always overflowing with rare discounts — and this month’s selection certainly doesn’t disappoint. For fashion, add these [Skechers snow boots](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0916T4SDR?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20) to your cart ahead of winter, or these [Tommy Hilfiger equestrian-style boots](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B06XS4BV3V?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that can lend themselves to a number of everyday outfits. For your home, check out the deals on this [bamboo shoe rack](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B7J2GBGW?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), portable [Dreo space heater](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09CT78HT8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), and this [lilac-scented Yankee Candle](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0042GLYG2?tag=people-onsite-backup-20). On your way out, scoop up a [holiday–themed set of Lenox mugs](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00TV5H3XC?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) and a [Hamilton Beach convection oven](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B097QGRMS1?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that can toast, air fry, bake, and more. [Lenox 4-Piece Holiday Mug Set](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00TV5H3XC?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $37.30 (orig. $49.95) [Dash Mini Electric Griddle](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01MSVSU1O?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $14.10 (orig. $17.45) [Tommy Hilfiger Shyenne Equestrian Boot](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B06XS4BV3V?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $53.70–$83.40 (orig. $149) [Suwoic Bamboo Shoe Rack Organizer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0B7J2GBGW?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $71.99 (orig. $89.99) [Avenue Plus Size Leggings](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C3ZQ4X6W?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $24.10 (orig. $36) [Dreo Portable Oscillating Space Heater](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09CT78HT8?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $42.50 (orig. $49.99) [Yankee Candle Lilac Blossoms Scented Candle](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0042GLYG2?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $20.10 (orig. $23.69) [Hamilton Beach Toaster Oven and Air Fryer](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B097QGRMS1?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), 127.50 (orig. $149.99) [Skechers Waterproof Snow Boot](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0916T4SDR?th=1&psc=1&tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $38–$64.95 (orig. $95) [Arrozon 7-Piece Packing Cube Set](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BP6K188R?tag=people-onsite-backup-20), $8.49 (orig. $8.99) Amazon Basics Lightweight Super Soft Bed Sheet Set, $24 (Save 23%) Best Amazon Brand Deals There are plenty of deals from [private Amazon brands](https://www.amazon.com/b?ie=UTF8&node=17602470011&tag=people-onsite-backup-20) to shop, too. One of the steepest discounts on our list is on this now-$5 [Amazon Aware Organic Cotton Bath Mat](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09CB4BG62?tag=people-onsite-backup-20) that more than 1,000 shoppers bought this month.
